content.detailedDescription:
I was enjoyin a cigarette when i took a picture of the ufo flying into a rainbow from my balcony

i noticed its shiny exterior and notices it foremast due to the rainbow 

i blinked and the object was pretty much gone much to my disappointment making ni sound at all and disappearing from my vision completely  

i was overwhelmed and excited by what i saw and also very elated.
content.summary: Ufo flying into a rainbow

content.detailedDescription: Around 8pm in the winter of 2014 i was out walking with my girlfriend in steven's point, wisconsin.The sky was clear. while headed back home i noticed what looked like two very bright stars or satellites above the apartment buildings and tree line. they were arranged vertically, one above the other, and remained motionless. within a few seconds of my noticing, they steadily decreased in brightness until they had disappeared completely. there was no sound or movement. they did not drift like flares or fireworks, and were not moving like satellites. no clouds were visible passing in front of them.
content.summary: Two bright lights slowly faded shortly after being noticed.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures the night of the blue moon, friday night july 31st 2015 in west covina ca. somewhere between 2 and 4 am i noticed the triangular object when i was checking my pics the next day. the dark triangle or delta shaped object is located on the lower left side of the picture of the moon. it looked like a craft of some sort to me. i'm not sure so i'm looking for some feed back as to what it is... i also have several before and after shots that i have been looking at closely to see any differences...
content.summary: Triangle or delta shaped looking craft on or hovering over moon picture

content.detailedDescription:
I became interested in ufos 1 1/2 months ago. reading many books on ufos. reading book on arcturians about how those who are in tune with them are in communication with them. and those people are 'on their screens.'  i try my best to live to the highest standard. maybe that means in tune with them----light worker. two days before the event, was praying and meditating that i could be in communication with them. i also know that what the mind concentrates on materializes into our reality. so, two days later, i went onto my balcony and looked south and saw a light that was stationary. was that way for about 30-45 seconds. then it grew very large into a perfect many sided star like light (about 12 points). it remained like that for about 5-10 seconds, then it simply vanished---just winked out. my feeling is that the ets were acknowledging my intention to have a relationship with them. that is my strong feeling.
1. i just went onto my patio to go outside.
2. i simply looked and noticed the light.
3. i thought the light might have been a plane.
4.  the light was stationary.
5. right after the whole incident, i felt that i had seen an et craft--they were acknowledging my intention to have a relationship with them.
6. the light just vanished--like a light that just went out.
content.summary: Stationary light that grew into very big perfectly star shaped light, then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
1 i was driving ,2 a big star in the sky , 3 to early to see stars 4 not moving
5 unknown 6 my driving lost sight of it
content.summary: Looks like star in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My attention was called to an orange glowing round object drifting slowly from west to east, approximately on a parallel course with nearby 14 mile road (which runs east-west). the object appeared to have a boomerang shaped set of wings or structure, also orange, on the other side of the, for lack of a better term, “sphere”. it made no noise that i could detect, but there was considerable noise in the background as fireworks were going off in the surrounding area, as it was well after dark on july 4th. as i watched the object drift into the east it seemed to start glowing more reddish and seemed to fade in and out somewhat as it got further away. at this point i gave up looking and went inside. whatever this thing was it just baffled me. it could possibly have been a drone, or maybe an elaborate chinese lantern, although the wind was wrong for that- i checked weatherbug after i went inside and the wind was supposedly out of the south at 5 mph, although it seemed to be a very still night with no detectable wind. i’ve also seen chinese lanterns and they are very unstable in their flight paths and ascend and descend abruptly depending on updrafts and downdrafts (and they don’t glow a solid orange either). this object was in a very stable flight path, although it seemed to be ascending slightly as it got further away. i can’t really say what height it was nor the size of the object. 
at the time i was in a condominium complex approx. a quarter mile south of 14 mile road in novi just east of walled lake.
content.summary: Orange glowing object with boomerang wing shape drifting west to east

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday 5 august 2015 12:05am. warrington ,cheshire, england
i've been suffering from insomnia lately so i decided to attend my 24hr gym for a work out.
on closing my front door i noticed a high pitched hum at low volume.
i looked up across the street and saw two illuminated disc shaped objects above the houses, i watched them for a minute then decided to take out my iphone and take a picture. the shapes remained in place without moving until the shape furest away blinked off followed by the other.
the strange thing about this was they did not fade, then just when out? the iphone camera still strangely flashed boxes up where the items was even though the items were no longer visible.
i got into my car and drove to the gym thinking about what i had just saw, as i arrived at the gym i could hear a helicopter in the direction of the sighting.
there was further helicopter activity for a couple of hours after i returned home, i looked into the sky on numerous occasions  hoping for a further sighting, without success.
i would be happy to share the photo with any parties interested.
please leave email address.
content.summary: I left my house to go to the gym. there was a quiet high pitch hum when i looked up there was 2 strange lights over the houses on the other side of the street.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a story from a while ago, i didn't write it down at the time so the details might be a bit fuzzy- i was 9, i am now 16 and have recently been reminded of my small encounter with a u.F.O.
i was coming out of my back door to go over to my neighbors where my mom was at, i went out the back door and turned at the garage. i saw an odd object in the air that hovered for a moment over my (other) neighbors house- i imminently knew what it was from watching documentaries. it was a small, all white object- i was in fact very surprised at the size of it. if i were to guess i would say that it was only about a 10 diameter object- a rounded top with a slightly darker shaded white. it was also fairly round at the bottom of it- it was fairly round in general. so i saw it, and i was mesmerized- it began to move, but was not even making a sound. it was silent, there wasn't any noise being emminated from anywhere. it moved, and i didn't say anything- i slowly stumbled towards it as it went over across slowly in one direction into a field. past the powerlines- i was moving very slowly towards it and after that it moved in a straight path behind a treeline. shocked, i ran over to my mom and told her all about it- but i'm not sure about what she said to me about it but i remember her being fairly calm about it. i didn't think too much of it over the years and didn't see anything else. no little green men, or even another saucer.
then the other day i was reminded of it and drew a documentation of it in mspaint.
content.summary: All white saucer object from childhood

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the 8:20pm flight from seatac to walla walla. we may have left a few minutes early. i was sitting in a window seat looking down on the cascade mountains towards the north. about ten to fifteen minutes into the flight is when i had my sighting. moving very quickly from the right of my view to the left, from east to west was a bright orange orb. this orb moved in a straight line. i looked for any details beyond the light but it did not seem to be attached to a body of anything like a plane. the light did not blink or change in any fashion. i was looking down on the cascade mountain range so i know it is not a star because it was below me. the duration of the sighting was three to five seconds. the size of the object was bigger and brighter than that of a star. the object was moving very quickly. if i had to guess it was about 3000 feet below us and the pilot had said we would be flying at an altitude of 19,000 ft. about five minutes later we were flying over i90 close to ellensburg washington, the sun was setting but i could still see cars moving along the highway. so when the object was observed i still had plenty of light to make my observations. i asked the person sitting behind me if she had seen anything but she had not. the rest of the flight was pretty normal. 

now the odd thing beyond seeing a bright orb was i saw something similar back in march 2014 from my home in walla walla. before the plane took off i had thought wouldn't it be cool to see a ufo again. this is what was on my mind at the time of my sighting.
content.summary: Orange orb moving from east to west over the cascade mountains seen from a plane.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting out of my car on august 4,2015 at 9:51 pm est and looked up and saw reddish orange objects coming toward me from the west headed east, i hurried to turn the my cell phone camera on and snapped a picture. as i walked to the other side of my car to let my dogs out, i noticed another group coming,again from the west and headed east,i ran up to the steps to the front door of my house and knocked on the door to get my husband outside and immediately ran back down and snapped another picture. they appeared to be in a some sort of formation. as we watched in total amazement,we saw another group coming from the west,headed east and i snapped my last picture. before we knew it they were out of our sight.I was so in awe that i didn't think to count the objects as they passed silently under the clear night skies. there are also utility lines in the pictures that could not be avoided. this all happened in about a minute,based on the time stamp on the pictures. after looking at each of the pictures,three in total,there were a total of 11 objects. there were three in the first group,five in the second group and three in the third group. the second of the three pictures, in my opinion, is the most accurate. in the other two pictures they appear to be distorted with tails and that definitely was not what we observed. also,when i enlarge the pictures the objects appear to be more oval than round,which,once again,is definitely not what we observed. i do regret that i didn't think to turn on the video on my cell phone. the photos are in the order that they were taken.
content.summary: Three different groups of round reddish orange objects with fuzzy edges moving silently under clear night skies.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were at the top of the tallest hill in our city they call it green hill we were having a smoke when we felt like someone was looking at us so we started to leave on our bike my brother shoe lace got caught in the gears so we stop to take it out he looked up and said look at that i looked up and seen a really big triangle in the sky i thought it was flat until it started to spin and that is when i saw it was not flat at all it was so close that we can see the the bottom of it and there was plains flying all over we were by the air port so there was flood lights all over   . it traveled vary slow and spun as we were talking about in the front or what you can call the front stared to vanish slowly and rise up in to the air the lights on it were vary dim it made no noise there were three other people on the hill i dont know if they seen it to but we got out of there fast because we did not know what we saw but it was not a plain or helicopter at that time our city had no helicopter and i did not have a camera if i did i could of go a full picture of it
content.summary: It was like a three dimentional triangle hovering in mid air

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home when i saw a bright orange light in the distance. i first assumed it was a planet because of the colour, but i realised that it was too large and too bright to be a planet. as i kept driving, i saw a plane approaching the area close to the object. the plane flew under or behind the object. the objected remained stationary until the light went out and it was not seen again.
content.summary: Glowing orb hovering in the sky as a plane flew passed/behind it. it stayed for a little while longer and then the light vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my friends deck around 11:00 pm in upper michigan on 8-02-15 it was a nice warm night so i decided to do a little star gazing and to look for a few passing satellites as they are so easily spotted in the night sky. as i was looking almost completely straight up  at a small cluster of faint stars something caught my eye. i saw a very small oval shaped object solid red in color moving fast and very high across the sky. it was moving approximately 8 times faster then a satellite moves and i watched it change direction about 4 times, it moved from one side of the sky to another in a very short amount of time. this object remained the same red color and did not very in brightness. it was about half the size a observable satellite would appear. this object did not sparkle or change brightness subtle like a star or satellite does but remained a solid red color almost like a lazer point. i am confident i was not observing a satellite as i definitely know what satellites looks like crossing the night sky. the object did not slow down in speed when it changed direction but turned quite sharply. i thought about taking a video of the object with my cell phone but decided it would not of turned out very good due to the size speed and altitude of the object. i actually  attempted to try but the sudden brightness of looking at my cell phone screen and looking for the right button to push ruined part of my viewing experience as i had a hard time adjusting my eyes to the night sky and searching for the object again, but i did luckily eventually spot it again and viewed it for another few minutes. i eventually stopped looking at it due to the fact that i was really straining my eyes and my neck was hurting from having my head so tilted back looking up. i had a hard time falling asleep wondering what i saw. it was a very surreal experience.
content.summary: Observed very small red oval object moving fast and changing direction

content.detailedDescription:
Me and other witness were seated on a balcony almost at roof top in amsterdam, around midnight october 1st or october 2nd  (depending if it was before or after midnight can't remember exactly) 2011 when suddenly 3 white lights in a shape of a triangle appeared hoovering just above roof tops.

i can't say the size or the distance of the object because i didn't have any point of reference.

it hoovered just like that for around 20-30seconds, then, suddenly it started moving very very fast and with instant acceleration to my left (~west) and disappeared into the horizon in no more then 5 seconds.
content.summary: 3 lights triangle shape suddenly appear  and hover then go away very fast into horizon

content.detailedDescription:
My ex wife amy and her daughter rebbeca driving south on rte 7 in charlotte vt around 10 :15 pm  8/3/2015.. amy saw a shooting star from left to right than another than another.. realized not shooting stars.. driving south on rte 7 lights followed ahead of them and over road about tree level..She got spooked rolled up windows locked doors. pulled over at dakin farms and lights stopped as she pulled over for about five minutes.. lights stayed with her.. continued south and lights stayed with her in front and mainly tree top height but did some ascending and descending.. lights followed them to vergennes.. she turned right onto new haven rd and lights continued south along rte 7 than turned right and came over them again in their subdivision and were tree top height.. amy's friend andre and chris saw lights and they have  a commnading view of the champlain valley. they live south of her about three miles..They said the lights had beams coming from them to the ground.. my mechanic lives in port henry ny and observed strange lights that did circles and other patterns over lake champlain looking toward vt.. .He stated they looked like they had beams of light going to ground. he called his son out to observe them because they were a strange  sight..15 minutes or more he observed them.. there were other witness that responded to social media .Bristol,bridgeport.Monkton vt all observed strange lights.. 10-11 pm is the time frame ..

  something happened over the champlain valley that night that was unusual..
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ex wife and her daughter driving south on rte 7 charlotte vt.. amy my ex saw shooting star than another than another from left to right. than lights appeared over car and followed them.. she got spooked rolled up windows pulled over at dakin farms on rte7

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving to work about 11:10 pm august 4, 2015 along highway 45 in milwaukee, this was near timmerman airport i saw a bright blue light streaking across the sky from my right to my left. it caught my eye because it was going super fast!(i even said to myself, "damn, that thing is moving!") as i continued to watch it while driving along the freeway it made a sweeping turn to its left and flew off in the opposite direction. there were other planes in the sky at the time that were going super-slow by comparison.  the object was a deep, illuminated blue in color and again was traveling super-fast. as it pulled away it appeared as though it had at least one tiny red light on the top of the blue. the object itself appeared blue, it was not an aircraft light and timmerman handles smaller aircraft, so i'm quite sure this was not the typical aircraft seen in the sky in this area quite frequently. sadly i was driving at the time and unable to pull over to attempt to get a better look, and it sped away so quickly i doubt i could have gotten a better view anyway. the most important thing here is the amazing speed at which it was moving!
content.summary: Blue light streaked across the sky at amazing speed, did a sweeping turn flew away

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i was on the freeway trying to find our way to yosemite national park after spending the day at hoover dam, it was about between 8:30pm and 9:30pm we were following gps directions and i had to get out of the freeway because i miss my exit not sure what frwy we were on but when i was about to exit the frwy when my gopro cam. mounted on dashboard caught this big bright light way before i saw it, the big bright light coming into the earth from space it was falling in a straight vertical line very fast when i finally saw it, it was falling fast but it was not breaking up like a meteor and i got exited because i know it is not from this world i even told my wife that is coming from heaven is all recorded in the video, but then the big bright light started to slow down and at that point i know is only obvious that some one or something was in control the light slowed down and it tuned off at about 1000 or 2000 feet from the ground and about less than a mile straight in front of us.
content.summary: Driving on the freeway gopro cam. on dashboard capture the ufo before i was able to see it

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back from the store i look up just above me about a mile away and saw this big huge glowing object i still haven't hovering for about 10 minutes and it just disapped and went out
content.summary: I was walking back from the store i look up just above me about a mile away and saw this big huge glowing object i still haven't hovering for about 10 minutes and it just disapped and went out

content.detailedDescription:
Ok well here goes...At first i wasn't going to send in my report, because to be honest with you, i believe i lost some validity, after i sent in a report on july 4th thinking at the time it was 100% a ufo. only to find out it was sky lantern, which apparently is a common firework or display. i feel like anything i say now, won't be taken as serious. besides the embarrassment...
 
but i have pictures this time...But besides that this event that took place is actually about to get a whole lot weirder, its actually very odd. so, i was sitting at dinner with my folks, and out of nowhere, i started to converse with them about an article i read earlier in the day, which was a story about neil armstrong's convo he had with nasa. something about aliens on the moon, and nasa kept requesring him to change frequencies/channels, or something of the like.

but, i started talking more about the possibilities of life beyond earth, and what might be really out there, and i don't know maybe it was a premonition or something (i'm getting chills thinking about it) but it was at this time my mother looked out the window and she said "look at that." i looked out the window, and well i just figured it to be a plane. maybe she was excited about the story i mentioned earlier, who knows? and well i looked and didn't think much of it.

next thing i know she says there are two now, she asked me do planes fly that close together. now, this had my attention. i go in my backyard, and what we all witnessed were three orange orbs in a triangular formation flying/hovering very slow in the distance of my back yard.

i was so stunned, we all watched in awe. especially after our convo, it was all sorts of freaky. finally my father had sense and got his camera, his ipad camera. my mother followed pursuit and got her iphone also. 

i didnt want to miss anything, this is a once in a lifetime observation i am witnessing ( it truly was a show, and i still cant see any purpose to the methodology of their flight pattern,  regardless though, it was really awesome.) anyways, finally sense kicked in me to grab my camera even one picture might help make the difference.

by the time i got back outside, the top ufo disappeared...But three more appeared in almost a straight line behind the original triangle, but they were blinking in and out so fast and randomly, it was difficult to count them all total, or where to even focus the camera, because when some disappeared others reappeared. but i would say with certainty, there were about 5-6 in the sky at one time. 

please let me know what you guys think of this, i promise what i say is a true story, maybe i added to much additional info, i really don't know when you ask for details if i am to detailed, but that is what happened with the event i witnessed. what i do know is this was all very weird, just the odds of me talking about "aliens" and immediately witnessing a ufo is mind boggling to me. 

i'm willing to answer any questions you need answered, also two other witnesses observed this happen besides myself. thank you for your time reading this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Three orange globes in triangular formation flying. they would disappear and reappear in different locations

content.detailedDescription:
1. smoking a cig on the front porch. 
2. i looked up and saw a shooting star and was looking for more. 
3. a giant low flying barley any sound plane. 
4. it had a white light in front and two in the back on each corner, and a red pulsing light in the middle back. it flew straight and slow as far as i could see about 6 min total. 
 5. i was in awe because of its silence and size. 
6. it just went to far to see.
content.summary: This thing flew directly above me very big and silent 1 white light in front 2 white in back and blinking red in middle back

content.detailedDescription: We didnt actually see it when we were there. we noticed it later when we were watching a 3 second video of my son jaidyn doing a trick on his scooter.
content.summary: Recording jaidyn at skatepark and we noticed a ufo in the background of the video

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting on my porch in my hammock looking to the west when i saw a white light over the columbia river coming from the west heading east no flashing lights no sound maybe about 500 feet above the river.  the light had 8 needle like structures one in every quadrant north south east west and in between.  frankly i don't know if i'm crazy but it seems like i see a lot of objects in the sky that i cannot explain.  i am familiar with aircraft and i look for satellites this was neither.  this is not the only craft i or like that i have seen from my home.
content.summary: i observed a white  light with  8 needle-like structures north south east west and in between

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound on the garden state parkway. as we crossed over the mullica river, i looked out over the river to the far left to see some of the sunset scenery. i often take pictures of sunsets from bridges while i'm in my car. i live on an island so i observe sunsets from a bridge quite often. the setting sun was partially behind a cloud. i noticed that directly to the north of this cloud, was another pretty cloud. as i turned to marvel at that cloud i immediately noticed a black spot in front of the 2nd cloud. the spot was very dark and did not appear to be obscured by the cloud. i asked my passenger if they could see it too, and they could. we both stared at the spot and tried to figure out what we were looking at, the shape was not any known shape that either of us have ever seen. it did not resemble a plane, helicopter, kite, balloon, or any animal. it looked round on the left side and like 2 unequal rounded steps on the right side. at no time did the object make any movement, it looked like it was just part of the sky but blacker than anything we've ever seen in the sky. it wasn't reflecting any sunlight & did not have any lights, which i specifically checked for when i was trying to decipher whether it was an aerial vehicle. it did not appear to be anchored to the ground by any ropes and did not move in any direction nor have any movement itself. the object looked to be pretty far away but i can't imagine anything that would be big enough to see, yet appear to be that far away. if the object was closer, then it should have been close enough to identify. we both assumed that the object had to be pretty large in order for us to be able to see it that far away while not being able to see enough detail to figure out what it was. we were both shocked and we were asking each other what the heck it was that we were looking at. we did a quick rundown of what it might be, plane, helicopter,kite, balloon, weather, and we both said it didn't resemble anything we could think of. it did not move at all. we both agreed that we were looking at something we haven't seen before and we both questioned whether we were being affected by the distance of the object and maybe couldn't see it right but the size, distance, color & movement of the object just did not add up to being anything man-made or animal that we know of. we did not notice the object or anything else in the sky an hour earlier, when we were heading southbound on the parkway through the same area where we saw the object. we also didn't notice anything unusual or the object in the sky before we reached the area where we saw the object. it was as though nothing was in the sky and then the object appeared. as we finished going over the bridge, we were coming up on the new gretna toll, we could no longer see the object due to trees being in the way and because we were lower than we were on the bridge. unfortunately, by the time we figured out that we were looking at something worth photographing, it was too late to still see the object.
content.summary: Black spot in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was out for my daily walk before noon. i thought i saw a helicopter over burke mountain. i looked and thought it was to stable. when i looked closer i saw that it was a box like vehicle with a rounded bottom. 
it hovered for about 3 minutes at about 200 feet above the mountain. it was totally stable with no motion at all. i looked at it for a long time thinking it might be a balloon. it did not change its position at all. the sun was reflecting off its metal surface.
it then shot straight up and stopped about 1000 feet higher. at that height it appeared to change the direction it was pointing several times as the sun appeared to reflect off of different sides. it stayed there for about 5 minutes then just took off straight up and disappeared
content.summary: Moved across top of burke mountain, hovered, shot up abouy 1000 feet, hovered and went straight up

content.detailedDescription:
3 orbs came into my room and started flying in circles above me and then  flew through the window and then i saw a ufo out of my visual range (the orbs came to the ufo).

each orb was a different color.

they do not hurt me, only searched the room and left at the light ( ufo ) and left.

sorry my english! sorry for not communicating very well!

good work!
content.summary: 3 orbs in my room and a ufo outside

content.detailedDescription:
On august 2, 2015 at 6:59pm i was photographing the sky from my patio after a storm.  when reviewing my photos i found in two shots an anomaly i cannot explain.  i am sending three photos of the event. one photo before the anomaly and the two photos that caught the anomaly.  i make no claims of what this is but thought you could shed some light on this.  it either moves or it’s stationary judging by the clouds.  one photo has a bird flying into frame.

photos are the raw images from my camera.  nothing has been done to them.

let me know your thoughts,



kevin.

all copyrights apply to the photos.
content.summary: Captured when i was photo graphing the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We were going toward davenport rd on kingscourt and stopped to check for traffic, i observed what i initially thought to be a balloon in the air over the kidsability school at about 15 degrees to the north east of our location.I pointed it out to my wife and explained it was a unusual balloon being dull gray and round with what appeared to be round globes on the outside. 
we continued to watch and then it rose ever slowly into the clear sky then  it took off at i can only describe as a blinding speed and disappeared strait up and made no sound or trail, i don't think that would be possible pushing through the air as we know.
i could not for the life of me believe what we had seen and how i now do think we are not alone.
i have checked different web sites but none of the siteings resembled our object also no lights were visible all was quiet.
i know i waited a long time but i did report it to another course but received no reaction then i went on u tube and saw your program that got my attention, regards, ron
content.summary: Wife and i approached davenport rd from kingscourt and i checked for traffic and noticed what at first thought to be a type of balloon but a  dull gray in colour stationary above the kids ability school ,the object rose slowly and it then took off  in a f

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to have a smoke and watch the planes like i always do . watched one fly by,then while looking up for another plane to come seen a star start moving. ran inside to get my wife and we both watched it until it was out of sight.This was no plain ,it had no stroblights and there was no sound.It was not the space station because i watched that the night before.
content.summary: Looking at stars then one started to move

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our way home from our work , when suddenly this bright orange ball appeared in the entfernuung of 2-3 kilometers in the sky.I said it to my colleagues , look as a ufo . all in the car saw it. all in the car saw it .We saw a light orange ball for 5 seconds , he quickly moved a few feet down and disappeared.It looked as if it would end , just as we arrived in this area , where it should be , we saw nothing . i do not know if these people , dominate the possibility of camouflage ( invisibility ) , this would at least explain why it disappeared so quickly in the sky 

my parents had experienced an experience . that was about 30 years ago . they had just visited my sister, who spent the time near geneva language studies.As the evening on the highway from geneva to zurich home tours , appeared behind 2 brightly lit windows. they were so bright that the whole surrounding area was as bright as day . they followed them for 2-3 minutes and then disappeared suddenly .
content.summary: We saw a light orange ball for 5 seconds , he quickly moved a few feet down and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a documentary called pbs the bomb.  they talk about the first nuclear bombs and the subsequent bombs.  if you look at the soviet footage of their first hydrogen bomb which is about 1:28:00 into the documentary, you can see disc shaped objects that sort of float around the screen if you see it frame to frame.  i cannot think of an other explanation.  if you look frame by frame it is weird
content.summary: Test footage with ufo
